name: Farfetch’d
flavorText:
The sprig of
green onions it
holds is its weapon. It is
used much like a
metal sword.

pokemon.name: Sirfetch’d
pokemon.flavorText:
Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles
can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s
leek withers, it will retire from combat.
